messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

installation issue windows image re installation issue image hello received ticket assigned funny because requested your help matter you have update about very important very attentive your instructions thanks installation issue image hello received laptop model for when tried install image we have showed picture attached similar issue we had when we installed last image version please can you update image let know install important because we receive joiners next week we haven other kind for them kind regards engineer ext
